programme.title: Gerald Ford, the new man in the White House, 1974
programme.short_synopsis: New revelations about President Gerald Ford's past, are discussed by the press.
programme.medium_synopsis: Campaign biographies, and some new revelations about President Gerald Ford's past come to light, including the fact he was christened Leslie King Junior.
